column1: '''Dragon Flame''' is a freeware application based on [[Didier Willis]]' [[Hiswelókë|Hiswelókë's Sindarin dictionary]]. It was first released in December [[2002]]. The latest version
column4: but there is a more recent Dragon Flame 2.0.1. for Linux (July [[2004]]). It should be noted that much material has been published since then; Dragon Flame incorporates lexicon version 0.993
column5: but the current (as of April [[2007]]) version of Hiswelókë's Dictionary is 0.99499.

column1: There will be no new versions of the program; only Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary will be updated [http://groups.yahoo.com/group/elfling/message/34887]
column2: and is of better use as a source than Dragon Flame.
